name: FairAuction
description: Decentralized auction to securely sell tokens to the highest bidder

Auction.color: Color // color of tokens for sale
Auction.creator: AgentID // issuer of start_auction transaction
Auction.deposit: Int64 // deposit by auction owner to cover the SC fees
Auction.highestBid: Int64 // the current highest bid amount
Auction.numTokens: Int64 // number of tokens for sale
Auction.ownerMargin: Int64 // auction owner's margin in promilles

Bid.amount: Int64 // cumulative amount of bids from same bidder
Bid.index: Int32 // index of bidder in bidder list
Bid.timestamp: Int64 // timestamp of most recent bid

state.ownerMargin: Int64 // default auction owner's margin in promilles

params.color: Color // color of the tokens being auctioned
params.description: ?String // description of the tokens being auctioned
params.minimumBid: Int64 // minimum required amount for any bid

finalizeAuction.access: self // only SC itself can invoke this function

setOwnerMargin.access: creator // only SC creator can set owner margin

params.ownerMargin: Int64 // new SC owner margin in promilles

results.color: Color // color of tokens for sale
results.creator: AgentID // issuer of start_auction transaction
results.deposit: Int64 // deposit by auction owner to cover the SC fees
results.highestBid: Int64 // the current highest bid amount
results.numTokens: Int64 // number of tokens for sale
results.ownerMargin: Int64 // auction owner's margin in promilles
